name: Fence Defence
description:
Peaceful Samurai are trying grow their root vegetables, but hostile chicken are up to no good. Protect your crops by building fences or use your sword if needed.

Gamepad controls: Control Stick - move, left face button - build fence, down face button - hit

Player one keyboard controls: 
W,A,S,D keys to move
Left Shift - build fence, Left Ctrl - hit

Player two keyboard controls: 
Arrow keys to move
Right Shift - Build Fence, Right Ctrl - Hit

Made during Global Game Jam 2023.
